Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_ASHE>
As promised, I brought the <BLUE>shoebill stork</BLUE> I've
been caring for. Please accept it as a gesture of
friendship and appreciation.

<NAME_MOB_ASHE>
I look forward to doing business with you again.

This little guy would probably be much happier
if I returned him to the wild.

I'm glad he likes it! I should come back and see
him again sometime.

<NAME_MOB_KENNETH>
Howdy! Here's the animal I'd been keeping, just
like I promised.
<PAGE>
This here <BLUE>bear</BLUE> is a present from Wheat Country
to you. I reckon I'm leavin' him in good hands.

<NAME_MOB_KENNETH>
Lookin' forward to doing business with ya again!

<NAME_MOB_YOSHINO>
Here we are! As promised, I brought an animal
from Sakura Country as a present for you.
<PAGE>
Please accept this <BLUE>boar</BLUE> as a sign of our
friendship.

<NAME_MOB_YOSHINO>
We look forward to doing business with you
again!

<NAME_MOB_MARIEL>
Hi! Thanks so much for everything! As a present
for our best customer, here's an adorable little
<BLUE>duck</BLUE> for you!
<PAGE>
Go on, take him!

<NAME_MOB_MARIEL>
Can't wait to do business with you again!

<NAME_MOB_KENNETH>
Howdy! Thank ya for all your hard work. We
really 'preciate it. As a token of our grat-i-tude,
here's an animal for ya.
<PAGE>
It's a <BLUE>fox</BLUE>. Take good care of 'im, now, y' hear?

<NAME_MOB_KENNETH>
Lookin' forward to doin' business with ya again
real soon!

<NAME_MOB_ASHE>
As a gesture of our thanks for your continued
business, please accept this <BLUE>monkey</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Brown monkeys are active during daylight hours,
but golden monkeys prefer to come out in the
evening.

<NAME_MOB_ASHE>
I look forward to doing business with you again.

<NAME_MOB_ASHE>
Thank you so much for all you've done for us. I
have a wonderfully adorable animal as a present
for you. It's a <BLUE>panda</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Please consider it a token of our appreciation for
your continued business.

<NAME_MOB_ASHE>
I look forward to our business relationship
continuing to grow from here on out.

<NAME_MOB_IOANE>
Oh, you got here at just the right time. Thanks
so much for always doing business with us!
Here, you can have this <BLUE>parrot</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Go on, now. Take him. Don't be shy!

<NAME_MOB_IOANE>
I'm looking forward to doing business with you
again!

<NAME_MOB_KATRINA>
It's a <BLUE>penguin</BLUE>. Here.

<NAME_MOB_KATRINA>
Come again.

<NAME_MOB_IOANE>
Oh, you got here at just the right time! I've got a
really unique animal for you. It's a <BLUE>white sifaka</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Go on, now. Take him. Don't be shy!

<NAME_MOB_IOANE>
I'm looking forward to doing business with you
again!

<NAME_MOB_ENNIO>
Heh. It's good you came. I have a gift for you
today. This <BLUE>raccoon</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Take good care of him.

<NAME_MOB_ENNIO>
Heh. I look forward to future business
opportunities with you.

<NAME_MOB_KATRINA>
It's a <BLUE>polar bear</BLUE>. Here.

<NAME_MOB_KATRINA>
Come again.
